list.definition:
select 
case
when id = '0' then 'kernel messages'
when id = '1' then 'user-level messages'
when id = '2' then 'Mail system'
when id = '3' then 'System Deamons'
when id = '4' then 'Auth'
when id = '5' then 'Syslog'
when id = '6' then 'Line printer subsystem'
when id = '7' then 'Network'
when id = '8' then 'UUCP SubSystem'
when id = '9' then 'cron subsystem'
when id = '10' then 'Auth priv'
end
from fc;
list.name: facilityNames
list.query:

when id = '8' then 'UUCP SubSystem'
when id = '9' then 'cron subsystem'
when id = '10' then 'Auth priv'

from fc;

list.definition:
select 
case
when  ('kernel messages' = '$facilityNames') then '0'
when  ('user-level messages' = '$facilityNames') then '1'
when  ('Mail system' = '$facilityNames') then '2'
when  ('System Deamons' = '$facilityNames') then '3'
when  ('Auth' = '$facilityNames') then '4'
when  ('Syslog' = '$facilityNames') then '5'
when  ('Line printer subsystem' = '$facilityNames') then '6'
when  ('Network' = '$facilityNames') then '7'
when  ('UUCP SubSystem' = '$facilityNames') then '8'
when  ('cron subsystem' = '$facilityNames') then '9'
when  ('Auth priv' = '$facilityNames') then '10'
end
